original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ ekanāḷāyaṁ brāhmaṇagāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismin ekanāḷāyam brāhmaṇagāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgalasatāni payuttāni honti vappakāle.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgala satāni payuttāni honti vappa kāle

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena kasi bhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammantaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati.

original: Atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho kasibhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam piṇḍāya ṭhita

original: Tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassū”ti.
analyzed: tvam pi samaṇa kasassu ca vapassu ca kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassu iti

original: “Ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī”ti.
analyzed: aham pi khalu brāhmaṇa kasāmi ca vapāmi ca kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmi iti

original: “Na kho pana mayaṁ passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṁ vā naṅgalaṁ vā phālaṁ vā pācanaṁ vā balībadde vā.
analyzed: na kho pana mayam passāma bhoto gotamassa yugam vā naṅgalam vā phālam vā pācanam vā balībadde vā

original: Atha ca pana bhavaṁ gotamo evamāha:
analyzed: atha ca pana bhavam gotamaḥ evam āha

original: ‘ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī’”ti.
analyzed: aham pi khalu brāhmaṇa kasāmi ca vapāmi ca kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmi iti

original: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:

na ca passāma te kasi

sā hoti amata phalā

original: yañhi bhavaṁ gotamo amatapphalaṁ kasiṁ kasatī”ti.

original: “Atha kassa cāhaṁ, bho gotama, imaṁ pāyasaṁ dammī”ti?
analyzed: atha kassa ca āha bho gotama imam pāyasam dammi iti

original: “Na khvāhaṁ taṁ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
analyzed: na khvā aham ta brāhmaṇa passāmi sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā

original: pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṁ gaccheyya, aññatra
analyzed: pajāya sa deva manussāya yassa so pāyasaḥ bhutto sammā pariṇāmam gaccheyya aññatra

original: Tena hi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, taṁ pāyasaṁ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi tva brāhmaṇa tam pāyasam appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehi iti

original: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṁ pāyasaṁ appāṇake udake opilāpesi.
analyzed: atha kho kasibhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tam pāyasam appāṇake udake opilāpesi

original: Atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
analyzed: atha kho so pāyasaḥ udake pakkhittaḥ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati

original: Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṁ santatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma phālaḥ divasam santattaḥ udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati

original: evamevaṁ so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
analyzed: evam evam saḥ pāyasaḥ udake pakkhittaḥ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati

original: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṁviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya, ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhotā gotamena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca,
analyzed: esā aham bhavantam gotamam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: labheyyāhaṁ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
analyzed: labheyya aham bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja labheyyam upasampadanti

original: Alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
analyzed: alattha kho kasibhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavato santike pabbajja alattha upasampada

original: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto

original: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.

original: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṁ ahosīti.
